welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bengbu, China! This charming city is known for its beautiful lakes, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bengbu has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: 三顾面舍
restaurants.description: 三顾面舍 is a noodle restaurant located in 蚌埠市.
restaurants.address: 富民东路 (悦水二街), 蚌埠市, 安徽

restaurants.address: 银泰城1F, 蚌埠市, 安徽

restaurants.name: 掌勺人河鲜
restaurants.description: 掌勺人河鲜 is a seafood restaurant located in 蚌埠市.

restaurants.name: McDonald's (麦当劳)

restaurants.description: Pizza Hut (必胜客) is a pizzeria located in the city.
